backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor handling user profiles, access control, and quiz management with per-user quiz sets, questions, and block names.
backend/migration.mo: No-op state migration module mapping old actor state to the new layout without transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented quiz-editor and gameplay features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files in the project.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment variables for configuring translation API endpoints.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based OKLCH theme defining colors and CSS variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React application’s root element and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, profile setup, navigation, and quiz session flow.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Renders a name input form and saves the user profile before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/config/translation.ts: Defines a translation API wrapper using MyMemory and exposes translateText for German→English translation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout methods, and loads/stores identity via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, quizzes, question counts, and question blocks via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestionTranslatio: Caches and fetches German→English translations for question text with loading/error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuizRecovery.ts: Provides a method to copy all questions from one quiz to another and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/quiz/adaptiveScheduler.ts: Implements an adaptive question scheduler with randomized ordering and repeat logic based on performance.
frontend/src/quiz/blockUtils.ts: Utility functions for managing 100-question blocks, ranges, labels, and block-based slicing.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/PdfImportPre: Empty placeholder file for PDF import preview UI.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfImportTyp: Empty placeholder file for PDF import type definitions.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/pdfTextExtra: Empty placeholder file for PDF text extraction logic.
frontend/src/quiz/pdfImport/questionExtr: Empty placeholder file for parsing extracted PDF text into questions.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizEditor.tsx: Full quiz editing UI including question management, block handling, and recovery of questions from other quizzes.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx: Main quiz gameplay component handling block selection, question loading, adaptive scheduling, answer flow, and optional translation.
frontend/src/quiz/QuizResults.tsx: Displays final quiz score, performance breakdown, and actions to replay or return to editing.
frontend/src/quiz/sessionTypes.ts: Defines interfaces for tracking question performance and overall quiz session state.
frontend/src/quiz/TroubleshootingPanel.t: Shows quiz metadata, question counts, and warnings to help diagnose empty or misconfigured quizzes.
frontend/src/quiz/types.ts: Re-exports shared Question and QuizId types from the backend.
frontend/src/quiz/validation.ts: Validates question text, answer counts, and correct-answer selection, returning structured errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session storage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the full-stack ICP app scaffold, tracking features across backend, frontend, auth, quiz flows, UI components, and build/deploy tooling.
